member.name: M:OresundBronTicketLibrary.Car.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use this constructor to specify if a Brobizz was used.
member.param: Set "true" if a Brobizz is used. Set "false" or "null" if no Brobizz is used.

member.name: P:OresundBronTicketLibrary.Car.TicketPrice
member.summary: Use this property to specify the ticket price for this vehicle type.

member.summary: Use this property to specify the vehicle type.

member.name: M:OresundBronTicketLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: This method returns the price including an eventual Brobizz discount.
